content.parText:
All events will be in Minneapolis and are accessible through buses or ride-sharing services. As former hosts ourselves, we recommend Air BNB or VRBO. If you prefer a hotel, there are many nearby.
Suggestions include:

TownePlace Suites 525 N 2nd St. Minneapolis, MN 55401

Aloft Minneapolis900 S Washington Ave. Minneapolis, MN 55415

Canopy Hilton Minneapolis708 S 3rd St. Minneapolis, MN 55415

If you are feeling fancy:

Hewing Hotel300 N Washington Ave. Minneapolis, MN 55401

Hotel Ivy201 S 11th St. Minneapolis, MN 55403

Alma Hotel528 University Ave SE Minneapolis, MN 55414
